about.about_description: Since its founding, RICH has expanded its reach across Rwanda, empowering religious leaders to champion health in their communities. Through the Community Listening System (CLS) and Management Information System (MIS), The following are key Programmes of RICH:

assistant.title: RICH Assistant
assistant.description: How can I assist you today?

hero.description: This  project enhance monitoring, evaluation, and community engagement, RICH seeks to establish a robust Community Listening System (CLS) and Management Information System (MIS) through religious channels, utilizing technology assets, to gather and manage qualitative and quantitative data.
